availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Also Spelled Brannon. Abraham O Brannin was born on November 19, 1819. He worked as a Tobacco Merchant in 1860. Brannin died on June 30, 1903.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville District 2, p. 387; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, 2nd Ward Louisville, p. 126; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, 7th Ward Louisville, p. 89; Find A Grave, "Abraham Owen Brannin ( November 19, 1918 - June 30, 1903)," Memorial #101120040, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=101120040&ref=acom. (accessed June 26, 2017).
